name: zrhrhm
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))

stmt.origin: mpbiri(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(c1, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, c1)
-| wi(wcel(c0, crg), wb(wcel(c1, co(zring, crh, c0)), wceq(c1, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Ring → c1 ∈(ZZring[RingHom]c0))
⊣ c1 = c1
⊣ (c0 ∈ Ring →(c1 ∈(ZZring[RingHom]c0)↔ c1 = c1))
